title: Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project
creator_credit: Paul Young, Maria Savarino, Ayen Guinto, Krystal Webb, Marten McEachran, Samantha Sharp, Laura O'Donnell, Chris Villarroel, Dean Sacco, Charles Skoutariotis, Katherine O'Neill, Troy Maguire, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Twelve stories from people from Melbourne’s western suburbs, created at ACMI as part of ‘Western stories : Expressions for the future’ Digital Storytelling project. The participants talk about the things they love and, in doing so, highlight what it is about them that make them unique.
